name: ASAuthorization.OpenIDOperation
desc: The kinds of operations that you can perform with OpenID authentication.

items.name: static let operationLogin: ASAuthorization.OpenIDOperation
items.desc: An operation used to authenticate a user.

items.name: static let operationRefresh: ASAuthorization.OpenIDOperation
items.desc: An operation that refreshes the logged-in userâ€™s credentials.

items.name: static let operationLogout: ASAuthorization.OpenIDOperation
items.desc: An operation that ends an authenticated session.

items.name: static let operationImplicit: ASAuthorization.OpenIDOperation
items.desc: An operation that depends on the particular kind of credential provider.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates an operation from the given string.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an operation from the given string.
